SOUTHERN ADRIATIC SEA.
NORTHERN IONIAN SEA.
VESSEL, WHITE HULL, EIGHT PERSONS ON BOARD,
IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE VICINITY OTRANTO CHANNEL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 06 592 4145,
39 06 5908 4697 OR 39 06 5908 4409,
FAX: 39 06 592 2737 OR 39 06 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: UFFICIO3REPARTO3@MIT.GOV.IT.
